titleStmt.title: The legend of St. Cuthbert with the antiquities of the Church of Durham / by B.R., Esq.
titleStmt.author: Hegge, Robert, 1599-1629.
R. B. (Richard Baddeley)

notesStmt.note: Written by Robert Hegge. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).

Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
